SELECT I_ID AS idPengguna, c_pgun_group as kodeGroup, c_pgun_otor as kodeOtoritas, i_peg_nrk as idNrk, trim(crypto16.DECRYPT (I_SANDI)) as idSandi, i_ip_address as ipAddress,i_idsekolah as idSekolah,n_email as namaEmail,n_hpno as noHp, c_hpno_aktif as kodeHpaktif,i_peg_nip as nipPengguna,n_peg as namaPengguna, n_peg_jabatan as jabatanPengguna,c_aktif as kodeAktif,i_idskpd as idSkpd
FROM TRBKUSPENGGUNA WHERE 1=1
and c_pgun_otor in (0,1,2,3,8)
and c_pgun_otor in (0,1,2)
and i_idskpd = #{idskpd} and c_pgun_otor IN (1,2)
and i_idsekolah = #{idsekolah} and c_pgun_otor = 2 union all SELECT a.I_ID AS idPengguna, a.c_pgun_group as kodeGroup, a.c_pgun_otor as kodeOtoritas, a.i_peg_nrk as idNrk, trim(crypto16.DECRYPT (a.I_SANDI)) as idSandi, a.i_ip_address as ipAddress,a.i_idsekolah as idSekolah,a.n_email as namaEmail,a.n_hpno as noHp, a.c_hpno_aktif as kodeHpaktif,a.i_peg_nip as nipPengguna,a.n_peg as namaPengguna, a.n_peg_jabatan as jabatanPengguna,a.c_aktif as kodeAktif,a.i_idskpd as idSkpd
FROM TRBKUSPENGGUNA a,trbkuspenggunasekolah b where b.i_idsekolah= A.I_Idsekolah and b.i_idpengguna = #{idpa} and a.c_pgun_otor = 2
